triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: UAVs are the primary platform for implementing the proposed edge computing framework in the paper.

triples.name: Multi-access edge computing
triples.relevance: Mobile edge computing is the foundational architecture that the paper extends with UAV-assisted capabilities.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Deep RL is the core machine learning technique used for optimizing UAV trajectories.

triples.name: Multi-agent reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: MARL enables independent trajectory management for multiple UAVs operating in the same environment.

triples.name: Trajectory optimization
triples.relevance: Trajectory optimization is the specific problem being solved for UAV path planning.

triples.name: Computation offloading
triples.relevance: Task offloading decisions are a key optimization variable alongside energy consumption and fairness.

triples.name: Energy consumption
triples.relevance: Energy efficiency is one of the three main optimization objectives in the paper.

triples.name: Multi-Agent Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel application of MADDPG for managing multiple UAV trajectories simultaneously.
